#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
    int test,m,n,k,grid[1001][1001];
    register int i,x,y;
    for(i=1;i<=1001;++i)
    {
        grid[0][i]=1;
        grid[i][0]=1;
    }
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d%d",&m,&n,&k);
        for(x=1;x<=m;++x)
        for(y=1;y<=n;++y)
        grid[x][y]=(grid[x-1][y]+grid[x][y-1])%k;
        printf("%d\n",grid[m][n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
